audioText: Nous serons certainement en retard si nous ne partons pas maintenant pour rejoindre nos collègues.
question: What will happen if they don't leave now?
options: They will miss their colleagues entirely
They will arrive exactly on time
They will be early for the meeting
explanation: The sentence uses 'serons' (future 1st person plural of être) to express certainty that they will be late if they don't leave immediately.
